value.0: The parchment before you is hastly written in blood as if the person who wrote it was terrified and frantic but is legible. "The Demon the weakling called Hades.. for he has silenced Vidorin and the weakling is no more.. I cannot exist without him.. I must bring him back.. The wealking's voices had insight.. perhaps..the demon bloodwitches..*you attempt to read but it isn't legible until further down the torn page* HE MUST COME BACK! Christ save me.. save him.. end the silence.. bring him back! HE CANNOT DIE! What is that noise? Christ tells me it's my revered brothers but they mean me harm! Perhaps I can convince them that the lord has sent me.."
